# Scroll Modes

**API Collection**

These constants describe the supported scroll modes used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAScrollLayer/scrollMode] property.

## Constants

- **none**: The receiver is unable to scroll.
- **vertically**: The receiver is able to scroll vertically.
- **horizontally**: The receiver is able to scroll horizontally.
- **both**: The receiver is able to scroll both horizontally and vertically.
